full_text: The bulls are in the playoffs the blackhawks won a crazy game for pat foley and the cubs won and I won $5 of a lotto ticket.  pretty good day

This is the most important and best  blackhawks win probably since game 4 of the 2020 playoffs vs the oilers 
We needed this win and to send pat out with a great win.  The hawks don't have a lot of good things happen to them this season but I'm glad we got this!
